TEXT.TITLE: FRONTIER INSURANCE <FRTR> IN ACQUISITION TALKS
TEXT.BODY: Frontier Insurance Group Inc said it is currently negotiating to acquire the business of Medical Quadrangle Inc, formerly its largest medical malpractice insurance producer, and the business of its other malpractice producer, Medical Professional Liability Agency Inc. It gave no details. Reuter
